title: BoostDay Tuesday (on friday?)
body:
https://www.twitch.tv/n3ac3y

he plays with subs at their elo and helps coach you on how to play better at your elo. 

since DQ allows him to group with his subscribers and stream the games. I played 2 games with him, it was a good time for sure.  taught me a lot.

i know this will probably get a lot of hate, but what he is doing isn't against any rules since people aren't paying him to boost their elo, since it is only one or two games for coaching purposes for his stream.
